Message.Title: Bullish Video on SKUL
Message.Msg: Really good chart analysis on SKUL. He nails Bernanke and the Fed in his opening comments with evidence! Love it!The video is on The Contrarian Trader Blog posted January 19 called Best Stocks - January 19 2013

Topic.Title: After listing several items for sale on Ebay some interisting info

Message.Msg: it wasn't so much the way i was doing it ebay would start download then abort many many times then would flip from basic to advance from listing to listing was another problem, Maybe there system overloaded at times. Again 15% is a chunk of funds for what you are buying. But Paypal should make money for them in the retail space.
I will be expecting for more news.

Message.Title: EBAY broke...
Message.Msg: Through it's resistance at $54...Now I fully expect it to be at $65 in a month...The growth of this company is tremendous with Paypal signing a deal with NCR to start doing charges in retail stores. Paypal is the online credit card, almost 30% of all online sales are transacted through paypal. Cramer is right this company is under valued.

Topic.Title: After listing several items for sale on Ebay some interisting info

Message.Msg: Try selling amy of your items at say an auction house -- IF they will take and sell your stuff with will collect from 20% - to 35% of your sales price! Try setting up your own brick and mortar store somewhere and getting any foot traffic, certainly it will cost you more than 15%... try and set up your own web site and get even a thousandth of a percent of the traffic in a day that ebay gets in just one minute .... you'll never do it ---- this is why you need eBay as a seller and why eBay/PayPal is so valuable

Topic.Title: After listing several items for sale on Ebay some interisting info

Message.Msg: get a kid ti list for you

Topic.Title: After listing several items for sale on Ebay some interisting info

Message.Title: EBAY is taking on Amazon's business. Target to $60 before next earning.
Message.Msg: Compare to the EPS and P/E between EBAY and Amazon, EBAY is the stock get in for much bigger growth,

Topic.Title: After listing several items for sale on Ebay some interisting info

Message.Msg: List on Craigslist first, it's free and takes about 2 minutes per item. No shipping the customer comes to you and pays cash. I list on Ebay but only as a last resort when CL doesn't get it done.

Topic.Title: After listing several items for sale on Ebay some interisting info

Message.Msg: "Between Ebay and PayPal Costs are about 15%" That's not bad at all. Craigslist is great if you don't value your life. I was in Home Depot and there was Paypal right on the checkout machine. I buy many things on ebay, for 15 years. It's much better now for the buyer, which as we all know, is where the money ultimately comes from. I can see why it is finally going up. When will they have a stock split? 70?
